A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The film was boring and the characters were not memorable. I was confused by the casino sequence which led to a random del Toro bit part that meant nothing. Seriously though who really wants to watch a show chase in space (ooh but they're going really fast) with curving lasers for 2 damn hours. The last battle with those useless ships was one of the dumbest scenes I have ever seen.  What the hell was the point of the movie?  What the Snoke?  Nothing makes any sense anymore.
